content: Contacted my PSET buddy on Thursday 10/6, and haven't gotten a response. I will start the PSET by myself, but I don't know what the protocol is for when the buddy doesn't respond.
subject: PSET Buddy Not Responded

content:
I can assign you a new buddy. Mercy Olagunju mercyo@mit.edu 

Please get in touch with her.
My new partner just emailed me saying their old partner got in touch with them and that they're no longer going to work with me. What do I do?
I don't have anyone else to pair you with, so you should begin the pset on your own. Please make use of our many office hours if you get stuck.
